effects: Restore 3000 (+9x, Heal) HP split over 3 turns to all allies while singing
Increase DEF and SPR by 40% for 3 turns to all allies while singing
name: Kupopo Dance
Kupopo Dance
庫啵啵之舞
쿠포포 댄스
Danse kupopo
Kupopo-Tanz
Baile kupopo
desc_short: Boost DEF and SPR for all allies and gradually restore HP
提高全體隊員防禦精神的數值+持續恢復HP
아군 전체의 방어력과 정신력 상승+HP 서서히 회복
Augmente la DEF et la PSY de tous les alliés et restaure progressivement les PV
Erhöht ANG und PSY aller Verbündeten, stellt allmählich LP wieder her.
Aumenta DEF y ESP de todos los aliados y recupera poco a poco la VIT
desc_long: Boosts DEF and SPR for all allies and gradually restores HP.
提高全體隊員防禦精神的數值，並持續恢復HP。
아군 전체의 방어력과 정신력이 상승하고, HP가 서서히 회복합니다.
Augmente la DEF et la PSY de tous les alliés et restaure progressivement les PV.
Erhöht ANG und PSY aller Verbündeten, stellt allmählich LP wieder her.
Aumenta la DEF y el ESP de todos los aliados y recupera poco a poco la VIT.
